name: Fly The Beach
about: Fly The Beach flying school is a premier aviation training institution, dedicated to providing top-notch flight education in a friendly and professional environment. Located in a scenic coastal area, our school offers a range of programs, including private pilot, instrument rating, and commercial pilot licenses. We utilize state-of-the-art aircraft and advanced flight simulators to ensure comprehensive training. With a low student-to-instructor ratio, our experienced instructors provide personalized attention to each student. Our partnerships with major airlines and career placement assistance guarantee a smooth transition into a professional flying career. Whether you aspire to fly for recreation or as a career, Fly The Beach flying school is committed to making your aviation dreams a reality.
